participant_1.name: Mia Anderson
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, loves to explore new ideas and cultures.
participant_1.background: My hair is brown and curly. I love watching sunsets. I love to surf. I live near the ocean. I hate red meat.

participant_2.name: Leo Thompson
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and imaginative, enjoys pondering deep questions and expressing ideas through writing.
participant_2.background: My glasses are held together by tiger printed duct tape. My newly bought laptop has a bum battery. I ride my bike to class since its only a mile away. I write short stories in my document tab with the use of a prompting app. My college courses are on philosophy and history.

content.text: Hi, my name is (user 1's name).
Hi, I'm (user 2's name).
Nice to meet you, (user 2's name). What are your interests?
I love writing short stories, riding my bike, and studying philosophy.
Oh, that's cool. I love writing short stories too. What kind of stories do you like to write?
I like to write stories about the future, or about people in different worlds.
Oh, that sounds fun. I like writing about different cultures and historical events.
That's cool. I've never tried writing about history before.
It's fun, but it can be challenging.
I can imagine.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a philosophy student at the local community college.
Oh, that's cool. What do you like about philosophy?
I love the way it makes me think about things in a different way.
That's cool. I'm a student at the local university.
Oh, what are you studying?
I'm studying business administration.
Oh, that's cool. I've always thought about going into business.
It's a lot of work, but it can be fun.
I'm sure it is.
What are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to graduate school, or I might get a job.
Oh, I see.
Yeah, I'm still trying to figure it out.
Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out.
Thanks, I hope so.
